title: FilmForum
summary: Professional web development techs in the palm of my hand
content: A film forum website where users can discover movies, write blogs, share reviews, and connect with a movie-loving community. This repository contains the frontend (React/Next.js) of the project. The backend is private, but you can see the functionality via screenshots.

title: File Transfer
summary: Got to learn about Python and Socket Programming
content:
This is a small project for the Computer Networking course i took. Its goal is to create a Server-Client program for file transfering with 2 parts, each part has different requirements.
Honestly, I had a pretty rough time coding this project. Since, I had to learn Python (cuz i wanna try it out) and other stuffs about Socket Programming.

title: Pokemon Matching Game
content:
This is a mini project for my Programming Techniques subject. The project's purpose was to test my understandings and knowledge about 2D pointer and Linked List as well as my programming skills.
This project was created based on the Raylib library. I chose it because it seems like a modern and easy-to-use library for videogames programming with many handy functions for visualization.
